title: Weekly Bonus Event: Warlords of Draenor Timewalking
body: Travel back in time to the Warlords of Draenor dungeons in this week’s Bonus Event.

title: WoW® Classic City Tour: Ironforge
body: Finding trainers and supplies can take a little extra time to adjust to in WoW® Classic, but we’ve got a handy guide to help you get around the dwarf capital city of Ironforge.

title: The Next Battle for Azeroth Content Update is Now Live!
body: The next World of Warcraft®: Battle for Azeroth content update is now live. Learn what’s ahead.

title: Hotfixes: September 20, 2019
body: ​Here you'll find a list of hotfixes that address various issues related to World of Warcraft: Battle For Azeroth.

title: WoW® Classic City Tour: Orgrimmar
body: Finding trainers and supplies can take a little extra time to adjust to in WoW® Classic, but we’ve got a handy guide to help you get around the Horde capital city of Orgrimmar.

title: Brewfest Kegs Are Tapped and Festivities are in Full Swing! September 20–October 6
body: Get ready to crack open a cold one with friends new and old during our revamped Brewfest!

title: AWC Summer Finals: Last Chance for BlizzCon 2019
body: The four very best teams from North America and Europe battle for the last two remaining spots for the AWC Global Finals at BlizzCon.

title: WoW® Classic: Getting around Azeroth
body: There are various modes of mass transit available to those looking to get around Azeroth. Learn more about each of these and where they are in our latest look into WoW® Classic.

title: Stormsong Valley’s Newest Hive is the Bee’s Knees
body: Discover what beekeepers are abuzz about in Stormsong Valley.

title: Jump Aboard the Pirate’s Day Celebration– September 19!
body: Avast ye landlubbers! It’s time to hoist sail and make way to Booty Bay for Pirate’s Day!

title: PvP Brawls Schedule 2019
body: Experience some of your favorite player-vs-player Battlegrounds with a twist during PvP Brawls! Read on to learn more.

title: Own a Piece of World of Warcraft History and Help Support Pencils of Promise *Sold Out!
body: Commemorate 15 years of epic adventures in Azeroth by owning a piece of World of Warcraft history—and feel good doing it. We’ve preserved a number of retired HP server blades that once hosted many World of Warcraft realms, and you can purchase one Tuesday, September 10 at 2:00 p.m. PDT and Thursday, September 12 at 7:00 a.m. PDT on the Blizzard Gear Store Europe.

title: 8.2.5 Content Update Notes
body: The official update notes for the new content update are here.

title: WoW® Classic City Tour: Stormwind
body: Navigating the capital cities in of Azeroth is a different affair in WoW Classic. Finding the trainers and supplies you need can take a little extra time to adjust to, so we’ve put together a handy guide to point you in the right direction.
